item.title: Minikube with VMware Fusion Driver
item.description: Minikube can be installed and uses vmware fusion as a driver to virtualize Minikube: To install the vmware driver: brew install docker-machine-driver-vmware Then, we can easily install minikube along wih starting minikube with vmware driver: brew install minikube minikube start --driver=vmware
